mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 3-15, east wall

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Random observations, statements of despair and statement of encouragement. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
JON VISITED GOT FISTED | Bring em out | Patrick L is a GODAPHOBIC | My best isn't good enough | You can do it | Every one leaves |
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Despair
Encouragement
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
